about_the_game:
Dive into a realm where artistry and puzzle-solving intertwine with the House of Jigsaw: Digital Art Manipulation DLC. This expansion introduces a groundbreaking dimension to the main jigsaw puzzle game, where you'll navigate through mesmerizing digital canvases, uncovering secrets through the power of visual manipulation. Are you prepared to wield the creative force and conquer the enigmatic House of Jigsaw?

Immerse yourself in the boundless world of digital art manipulation in House of Jigsaw: Digital Art Manipulation DLC. Unleash your inner artist, sharpen your visual acumen, and embrace the wonders of digital artistry with the enigmas of the House. Will you emerge as a triumphant creator, or will you become another enigma in the House's twisted legacy?



  • Dive into the world of digital artistry
  • Multiple puzzle selection
  • Cutouts up to 1000 pieces
  • Different edge cutouts
  • Change background color
  • Incredible zoom
  • Compare your time score with players on the community page
